name: TeleDodge
description:
Well, that was a mistake. The teleporter ripped a hole in the fabric of space and time, well, mostly space, but still probably time. Sucked into an unknowable dimension, your only defense against the orbs falling from the sky is a swift step and, well why not keep using that teleporter?

Loads Of Features!

~1 Level!

~1 Character!

~2 Ball Sizes!

~1 Song!

~Not Much Else!

TeleDodge is a game by CakeNeq Games featuring music by John Wood.
